text: Maila Ankkuri (born January 1944) is a Finnish former long track speed skater who was active in the 1960s. Ankkuri represented her nation at the World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women in 1962, finishing 28th overall. She also competed at other international competitions. Between 1962 and 1965 she competed four times at the Finnish Allround Championships, with the best result in 1963 finishing fourth. == Records== === Personal records === ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Finnish female speed skaters Category:Living people
title: Maila Ankkuri
